meanings.definition: A symbol used in search queries to represent any sequence of characters
meanings.sent1: When searching for a file, you can use a wildcard like '*' to find all similar names.
meanings.sent2: The wildcard '?' can stand for any letter in a search term.
meanings.sent3: I tried to find the document using a wildcard, but ended up with too many results!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a wildcard, full of unpredictable thoughts and ideas.
meanings.sent5: The wildcard symbol made the search process much easier to understand.

meanings.definition: A player or team that has not been seeded or ranked in a tournament
meanings.sent1: The wildcard entry surprised everyone by reaching the finals.
meanings.sent2: The wildcard team defeated the reigning champions in a thrilling match.
meanings.sent3: The wildcard player became the unexpected hero of the tournament.
meanings.sent4: Her underdog story turned her into a wildcard to watch out for.
meanings.sent5: The wildcard's victory was a true underdog story that inspired many.

meanings.definition: A variable that can be used to represent any value in programming
meanings.sent1: In programming, a wildcard can stand in for any number or text.
meanings.sent2: The programmer used a wildcard to simplify the code and make it more flexible.
meanings.sent3: The wildcard in the code seemed to have a mind of its own, changing values unexpectedly.
meanings.sent4: His coding style was like a wildcard, always surprising his colleagues with innovative solutions.
meanings.sent5: The wildcard function allowed the program to adapt to different inputs seamlessly.
